title: Avanti Pizzeria, Regal Riverside Hotel newly introduces Dolce Indulgence Weekend Dessert BuffetTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Avanti Pizzeria, Regal Riverside Hotel newly introduces Dolce Indulgence Weekend Dessert Buffet
Avanti Pizzeria is going to pamper your sweet tooth with our new Dolce Indulgence Weekend Dessert Buffet ! Stay indoor or opt for our alfresco seating area and match your holiday mood with a range of delicate pastries, cakes and freshly brewed Italian coffee along the riverside for a relaxing weekend.
Daily baked from our Pastry Kitchen, the dessert buffet showcases an array of mouth-watering desserts from the irresistible Lavender Cheese Cake , Tiramisu , Chocolate Mousse Cake , Crème Brûlée (Classic/Chocolate Flavour) , Panna Cotta with Strawberry , Oreo Serradura to a selection of delicious pastries and cakes like Bird’s Nest Egg White Tart , Portugal Egg Tart , Scone , Cup Cake , Danish Pastry , Chicken Puff and more. The popular Chocolate Fondue is one of the highlights in the buffet and is served with fresh fruit and marshmallow at your choice. Priced at only $148 per person , the Dolce Indulgence Weekend Dessert Buffet is served along with a freshly brewed coffee or tea, offered from 3pm to 5pm every Saturday, Sunday and Public Holiday. Students could enjoy an exclusive 30% discount with their valid student card upon patronage !
Prices stated in Hong Kong dollars and subject to 10% service charge.
Source:- Regal Hotels
